channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car parked on blind corner for weeks not moving, 20th February
item.description:
This car has been parked on this blind corner for weeks and causes accidents. It needs to be moved ASAP. Reg: Y619 YGO

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 185,187, South Croxted Road, Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tatty caravan still abandoned, rubbish piling up, 20th February
item.description:
This caravan was abandoned 5 weeks ago. No action taken yet. I’ve seen teenagers hanging around and am worried they might be doing drigs on it or about to set fire to it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Avenue, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsing drain grill, 20th February
item.description:
The surround to the drain grill has eroded allowing the grill to sink. It requires to be reset to avoid difficulty driving over as the hole is deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Whitecroft Way, Park Langley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At the Junction of the corner of 71 Fellows Road, London NW33JY to the access to Bray Tower on the public pavement., 20th February
item.description:
A concrete bollard in ther pavement at the above location has been knocked out by a vehicle and is obstructing the pavement. Please reinstate the bollard as soon as possible. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Fellows Road, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: False SORN Mini Cooper, illegally erected tent, 20th February
item.description:
For over a year now there's been a Mini Cooper on the pavement area. It was initially being fixed by the owner but now it's been SORNed with no MOT, on this public bit of land. The owner has also illegally erected a tent above this car, damaging public land / council property as he has drilled the structure into the ground. It is not private land, the car shouldn't be there if SORNed, and the tent frame shouldn't have been drilled into the ground illegally, causing damage to public land / council property.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walker Close, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Christmas tree in Benhill road, 20th February
item.description:
Near number 23, opposite street light number 2215-04. Please note I've reported this twice, and no action has been taken. If you can't locate the tree, despite photos and description, please contact me.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benhill Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking restriction sign missing, 20th February
item.description:
The parking restriction sign has been ‘removed’ which then allows those pick up truck to park on Alexander close every day as I’m sure he would say there is no restriction as the sign is missing

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harper Close, Southgate

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 20th February
item.description:
A load of rubbish bags and a rotten foam mattress dumped at graveyard end of Shafton Road. It’s an eyesore and dangerous to have in a road where children play outside.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shafton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Broken Manhole Cover, 20th February
item.description:
Outside the property of 5/5a Somerton Road the manhole cover has become cracked and has split. There is a significant drop underneath. It is currently covered by chipboard but need urgent fixing please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Somerton Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain collapsing, 20th February
item.description:
Two drains along the church side of North Cray Road are collapsing. One is outside 22 North Cray Road and the other further down towards St Mary’s Church.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, North Cray Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Line has disappeared., 20th February
item.description:
On the corner between Heddon Court Avenue and the service road to Braemore Court in Cockfosters, outside the Dr's surgery there was (10years + ago) a line to show that you could not park on the corner as there is not really enough room to do so. Over the years the line has warn away and has not been visible for years. This has resulted in people parking there all the time which not only obstructs the Dr's driveway but also often partially blocks the entrance to the service road and makes it so dangerous trying to pull out as visibility is poor when a car is there.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heddon Court Avenue, Southgate
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brecknock road, 20th February
item.description:
Full of dangerous potholes, making it very dangerous to cycle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Brecknock Road, Archway, Greater London

item.title: Loose paving stone on corner of pavement., 20th February
item.description:
It has been like this for several years and is really quite dangerous.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cockfosters Road, Enfield

item.title: Litter along the front and side of 177 Long Lane, 20th February
item.description:
There has been littering on the pavement and road along the side and front of 177 Long Lane for weeks now - I have picked up some over the past few weeks especially the broken glass but there is sandwich and food packaging, empty drinks cans and bottles including alcohol as well as paper litter and dog poo - some gets blown away and crushed by parking vehicles on Hyde Road - I never see anyone cleaning the streets collecting any litter in this area - it’s not pleasant and is a busy walkway

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hyde Road, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
